install.name: RSGallery2 Display
install.author: Jonathan DeLaigle and Jonah Braun
install.copyright: (C) 2007 Ground Level Solutions. All rights reserved.
install.description: Usage: {rsg2_display: template, GID} or {rsg2_display: template, GID, paramName=value, paramName=value, ...} for as many parameters as you need to specify. Template should be the name of the template you want to use. GID should be the numerical ID representing the gallery, this can be found in the first column of the gallery listing.
